title: Bloomberg's Halen on Growth of Automation in Restaurants(Audio)
itunes:title: Bloomberg's Halen on Growth of Automation in Restaurants(Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. GUEST: Mike Halen, Bloomberg Intelligence Senior Restaurant Analyst, on federal policies and their potential impacts on restaurants, as well as the growth of automation.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
